message.msgstr: This section allows you to configure the firewall to filter based on MAC, IP or port to protect your network from viruses and other malicious activity on the Internet.
Default Policy: Describes how packets not matching any rules will be handled
Current MAC/IP/Port filtering rules in system

message.msgid: port filter current source port range
port filter current dest port range

message.msgstr: This section is provided for the configuration of the Virtual Server.

This section is dedicated to the DMZ, or De-Militarized Zone. Since some Internet applications, such as interactive games or video may not function properly behind the firewall, the DMZ allows a specified host on the LAN to access the Internet without any firewall protection.
The Content Filtering Settings page helps to control access through various types of restrictions.

message.msgstr: System Security Settings allows you to make various configurations that maintain and protect your device.

message.msgid: alert giving up:cannot create an xmlhttp instance
message.msgstr: Giving up :(Cannot create an XMLHTTP instance)

message.msgid: forward alert ip address format error
forward alert ip address is empty
forward alert it should be a 0 to 9 number
forward alert ip address range error
forward alert the rule number is exceeded
forward alert ip address is required
forward alert illegal characters are not allowable
forward alert the same rule has existed
port filter alert the rule number is exceeded
port filter alert please input any ip or/and port value
message.msgstr: Please input any IP or/and port value.

message.msgid: port filter alert please fill the mac address in correct format
message.msgstr: Please fill the MAC Address in correct format! (XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX)

message.msgid: port filter alert invalid source port number: from
message.msgstr: Source PortRange(SPR): Invalid start port number !

message.msgid: port filter alert invalid source port number: to
message.msgstr: Source PortRange(SPR): Invalid end port number !

message.msgid: port filter alert invalid source port range setting
message.msgstr: Invalid source port range setting ! Start port number must less than or equal end port number.

message.msgid: port filter alert invalid dest port number: from
message.msgstr: Dest PortRange(DPR): Invalid start port number !

message.msgid: port filter alert invalid dest port number: to
message.msgstr: Dest PortRange(DPR): Invalid end port number !

message.msgid: port filter alert invalid dest port range setting
message.msgstr: Invalid dest port range setting ! Start port number must less than or equal end port number.

message.msgid: port filter alert please input src or dest from port number
message.msgstr: Please input Source or Dest start port number.

port filter alert dest ip address format error
port filter alert the same rule has existed
port filter alert illegal characters are not allowable
port filter alert the action of this rule would be the same with default policy
message.msgstr: The action of this rule would be the same with default policy.

message.msgid: content filter alert please select the rule to be deleted
message.msgstr: Please select the rule to be deleted.
